column7: Relationship of microorganisms to food manufacture and preservation, to food and industrial fermentation and processing, and to food-borne illness. Same as MCB 434. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Credit is not given for FSHN 471 and FSHN 175. Prerequisite: Previous microbiology course such as MCB 100, MCB 250, or MCB 300.
